skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Increase DEF] buff for 1 turn on the ally with the lowest HP. Will not be placed on this Champion. Has a 100% chance instead if this attack is critical.
skills.name: Antique Staff

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase RES] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Allies receive 10% less damage from Champions whose RES is lower than or equal to theirs.
